## Functions

### createDependencyFile() {#a5cdb223afb9f4268a3716aaac56826bd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static int createDependencyFile (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tgparser">TGParser</a> &amp; Parser, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; argv0)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a dependency file for <code>-d</code> option.

This functionality is really only for the benefit of the build system. It is similar to GCC&#39;s <code>-M&#42;</code> family of options.

Definition at line <a href="#l00081">81</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/main-cpp">Main.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TableGen is a tool which can be used to build up a description of something,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then invoke one or more &quot;tablegen backends&quot; to emit information about the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// description in some predefined format.  In practice, this is used by the LLVM</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code generators to automate generation of a code generator through a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// high-level description of the target.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer">Timer</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer/#a27f97da1b1d19ad74a847703ca25c455">stopTimer</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return early if any other errors were generated during parsing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (e.g., assert failures).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e5d0e3dd91cfca21762a24e128f184f">ErrorsPrinted</a> &gt; 0)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Write output to memory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer">Timer</a>.startBackendTimer(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Backend overall&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::string OutString;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-string-ostream">raw&#95;string&#95;ostream</a> Out(OutString);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> status = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ApplyCallback will return true if it did not apply any callback. In that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case, attempt to apply the MainFn.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tablegen/emitter/#ad8ce24c3c1a2d743d528e1bb58731d17">TableGen::Emitter::ApplyCallback</a>(Records, Out))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    status = MainFn ? MainFn(Out, Records) : 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer">Timer</a>.stopBackendTimer();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (status)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Always write the depfile, even if the main output hasn&#39;t changed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it&#39;s missing, Ninja considers the output dirty.  If this was below</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the early exit below and someone deleted the .inc.d file but not the .inc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// file, tablegen would never write the depfile.</span></CodeLine>
